documentation.text: @title Interface for a fully featured token.xyz Proxy.

@notice Error thrown when the requested function is not found in any features.
 @param selector The function's selector that was attempted to be called.
@title Interface for a fully featured token.xyz Proxy.

@notice Error thrown when the requested function is not found in any features.
 @param selector The function's selector that was attempted to be called.

params.selector: The function's selector that was attempted to be called.

params.implementation: The address supposed to include an older implementation of the function.

params.distributionDuration: The time interval while the distribution lasts in seconds.
params.merkleRoot: The root of the merkle tree generated from the distribution list.
params.owner: The owner address of the contract to be deployed. Will have special access to some functions.
params.token: The address of the token to distribute.

params.firstOwner: The first address to assign ownership/minting rights to (if mintable). The recipient of the initial supply.
params.initialSupply: The initial amount of tokens to mint.
params.mintable: Whether to create a mintable token.
params.multiOwner: If true, use AccessControl, otherwise Ownable (does not apply if the token is not mintable).

params.owner: The owner address of the contract to be deployed. Will have special access to some functions.
params.token: The address of the token to distribute.

params.impl: The implementation contract for the function.

returns.airdropAddresses: The requested array of contract addresses.

returns.tokenAddresses: The requested array of token addresses.

returns.vestingAddresses: The requested array of contract addresses.

params.idx: The index in the rollback history.

returns.impl: An implementation address for the function at         index `idx`.

returns.rollbackLength: The number of items in the rollback history for         the function.

params.newOwner: The address of the new owner.

params.targetImpl: The address of an older implementation of the function.

params.newOwner: The address that will become the owner.

devdoc.title: Interface for a fully featured token.xyz Proxy.

NotImplemented(bytes4).notice: Error thrown when the requested function is not found in any features.

NotInRollbackHistory(bytes4,address).notice: Error thrown when the requested function selector is not in the target implementation.

TransferOwnerToZero().notice: Error thrown when attempting to transfer the ownership to the zero address.

MerkleDistributorDeployed(address).notice: Event emitted when creating a new airdrop contract.

MerkleVestingDeployed(address).notice: Event emitted when creating a new vesting contract.

OwnershipTransferred(address,address).notice: Emitted by Ownable when ownership is transferred.

ProxyFunctionUpdated(bytes4,address,addr.notice: A function implementation was updated via `extend()` or `rollback()`.

TokenDeployed(address).notice: Event emitted when creating a token.

createAirdrop(string,address,bytes32,uin.notice: Deploys a new Merkle Distributor contract.

createToken(string,string,string,uint8,u.notice: Deploys a new ERC20 token contract.

createVesting(string,address,address).notice: Deploys a new Merkle Vesting contract.

getDeployedAirdrops(string).notice: Returns all the deployed airdrop contract addresses by a specific creator.

getDeployedTokens(string).notice: Returns all the deployed token addresses by a specific creator.

getDeployedVestings(string).notice: Returns all the deployed vesting contract addresses by a specific creator.

getRollbackEntryAtIndex(bytes4,uint256).notice: Retrieve an entry in the rollback history for a function.

getRollbackLength(bytes4).notice: Retrieve the length of the rollback history for a function.

migrate(address,bytes,address).notice: Execute a migration function in the context of the TokenXyz contract.      The result of the function being called should be the magic bytes      0x2c64c5ef (`keccak('MIGRATE_SUCCESS')`). Only callable by the owner.      The owner will be temporarily set to `address(this)` inside the call.      Before returning, the owner will be set to `newOwner`.

rollback(bytes4,address).notice: Roll back to a prior implementation of a function.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.
